name: Francy Droo and the Secret of the Shady Midnight Caller
name_original: Francy Droo and the Secret of the Shady Midnight Caller
description:
Solve another thrilling mystery tale with FRANCY DROO!

A phone call in the dead of night. A soap opera star with a shady past. Bank paperwork. Sounds like another case for Francine "Francy" Droo, sassy teen detective extraordinaire!

When Francy's new phone goes off in the middle of the night, she's ready to write it off as just another wrong number—until the person on the other end starts threatening her life. Now she's on the hunt for a missing check, dodging shady characters around every corner, and the only thing keeping her alive...is you.

Help hunky actors with their social media problems! Interrogate witnesses at the hamburger stand! Solve SO MANY PUZZLES (boy I hope you like puzzles)—all while helping your awkward friend Katie keep her job at the soap opera. What are you waiting for? There's a mystery afoot!

The long-awaited sequel to our smash-hit, Francy Droo and the Mystery of the Missing Mother-in-Law!

Features

- Three times as much story and mystery as the original!
- Hidden object puzzles! Social media puzzles! Hunky guy puzzles!
- Craiggers. Everyone loves Craiggers. You'll love Craiggers.
- Full voice acting* (*in three scenes)!
- Story by popular YouTuber (and sassy teen detective) Michael "arglefumph" Gray.

Note: We are not affiliated with any other sassy teen detectives. This game is a work of PARODY and is not intended to infringe on anyone's copyrights. (So please don't sue us.)
